mapper.select: SELECT MPID.COMPANY_CD , MPID.DIVISION_CD , MPID.INOUT_NO , MPID.SEQ , MPID.ITEM_ID , MI.ITEM_NM , MI.ITEM_SPEC , MI.ITEM_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MPID.COMPANY_CD, MPID.DIVISION_CD, 'MD0002', MI.ITEM_TYPE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS ITEM_TYPE_NM , MI.PURCHASE_UNIT , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MPID.COMPANY_CD, MPID.DIVISION_CD, MI.PURCHASE_UNIT) FROM DUAL) AS PURCHASE_UNIT_NM , MPID.INOUT_QTY , MPID.UNIT_PRICE , MPID.AMOUNT , MPID.LOCAL_AMOUNT , MPID.DESCRIPTION , MPID.PURCHASE_INOUT_ID FROM MOM_PURCHASE_INOUT_DTL MPID , MOM_ITEM MI WHERE MPID.COMPANY_CD = MI.COMPANY_CD AND MPID.DIVISION_CD = MI.DIVISION_CD AND MPID.ITEM_ID = MI.ITEM_ID AND MPID.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPID.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPID.INOUT_NO = #{inoutNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY MPID.INOUT_NO , MPID.SEQ
